div.p: Reviews by Aaron Jubb (USGS), Robert L. Kleinberg (Schlumberger), and John Ratulowski (Schlumberger) improved this manuscript. Peter Warwick (USGS) contributed the New Albany shale sample. Paul R. Craddock (Schlumberger) provided suggestions toward spectral analysis. This research was funded in part by the USGS Energy Resources Program. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
